name: HitchGreen
description: Get there for the best price. No Traffic
overview:
Get there for the best price. No Traffic, No Parking Fees. Simply create or join a ride. You will not be charged until a professional bus service confirms your trip. Enjoy your trip and leave the worries behind.

How it works

We use charter buses and shuttle vans provided by professional transportation services.

  • Create or join a trip.
  • Let others know about your trip.
  • Carriers either confirm the trip or the trip request expires.
  • If confirmed, your credit card is billed and the trip itinerary is emailed to you.
  • Enjoy your trip!

Feel good about it, knowing that carbon offsets are purchased to mitigate environmental impact!
